caption.title: Morphology characterization.
caption.p: (a) SEM image of pristine TiO 2 nanofibers. (b) Low- and (c) high-magnification SEM images of Co 3O 4/TiO 2 hierarchical heterostructures. (d) Typical TEM image of the single Co 3O 4/TiO 2 hierarchical nanofiber. (e) HRTEM image of the heterojunction region. (f) HRTEM image of the Co 3O 4 nanosheet surface.
